title: Principal Backend Engineer
jobSummary: At Feeld, we are creating a world where everyone is more intimately connected to each other and themselves. This role involves integrating and managing complex systems in a dynamic environment, applying innovative technology to the dating space, and supporting the company’s scaling efforts.
responsibilities: Explore new backend technologies and architectures to enhance our platform’s scalability, reliability, and performance.
Build robust and scalable backend systems, focusing on creating high-quality, maintainable code and optimizing application performance.
Support the engineering team by providing mentorship, conducting code reviews, and driving best practices in backend development.
Guide teams through scaling distributed databases milestones (e.g., Dynamo, Cassandra).
requirements: 8-10 years of experience with backend development, including deep expertise in technologies such as Node.js, Python, Java or similar, and a strong understanding of system architecture and distributed systems.
Experience with a range of cloud services and infrastructure management across providers (AWS, GCP, Azure).
Led teams through challenging technical projects and provided leadership in solving complex backend problems.
Experience in designing and implementing scalable data solutions.
Understanding of the principles of security and compliance, ensuring backend systems are secure and adhere to industry standards.
Ability to lead scaling efforts for platforms with user bases growing from 2-10M.
